items.prompt: Questions and negatives (speak the words or reorder the words in sentences) Ако е подреждане в изречения-ще трябва да се дадат отговорите на английски с разбъркани думи-те да ги подредят.
Задание: I was cooking dinner. The phone rang. I was cooking dinner when the phone rang. The phone rang while I was cooking dinner.
Задание: He was taking a shower. Someone knocked on the door. He was taking a shower when someone knocked on the door. Someone knocked on the door while he was taking a shower.
Задание: They were watching TV. The lights went out. They were watching TV when the lights went out. The lights went out while they were watching TV.
Задание: She was walking in the park. It started to rain. She was walking in the park when it started to rain. It started to rain while she was walking in the park.
Задание: We were having a picnic. A bee stung me. We were having a picnic when a bee stung me. A bee stung me while we were having a picnic.
Задание: The children were playing. Their mother came home. The children were playing when their mother came home. Their mother came home while the children were playing.
Задание: I was driving to work. I saw an accident. I was driving to work when I saw an accident. I saw an accident while I was driving to work.
Задание: They were sleeping. The earthquake happened. They were sleeping when the earthquake happened. The earthquake happened while they were sleeping.
Задание: He was reading a book. His friend called. He was reading a book when his friend called. His friend called while he was reading a book.
Задание: We were eating dinner. The doorbell rang. We were eating dinner when the doorbell rang. The doorbell rang while we were eating dinner.
Задание: She was studying. Her computer crashed. She was studying when her computer crashed. Her computer crashed while she was studying.
Задание: You were swimming. A storm began. You were swimming when a storm began. A storm began while you were swimming.
Задание: They were hiking. They got lost. They were hiking when they got lost. They got lost while they were hiking.
Задание: I was writing an email. The power went off. I was writing an email when the power went off. The power went off while I was writing an email.
Задание: He was mowing the lawn. It started to snow. He was mowing the lawn when it started to snow. It started to snow while he was mowing the lawn.
